name: Scary Dinosaur
description:
From the creators of “ The Clown Slickpoo ”, comes sequel Scary Dinosaur.   
This time you are locked in Underground of the Clown’s House. Basement is the place of nightmares where you will need to solve all kind of puzzles to save your brother Charlie and to survive. This Challenging survival game needs you to keep your eyes and ears open in the scary horror and survival basement.

From driving RC Car to controlling CCTV Cameras in order to complete tasks and outsmart your enemies you will enjoy in great adventure from perspective of little boy. Run, hide and think.

GAME FEATURES :

Huge Underground in HD graphics
Dinosaurs
RC Car
Beautiful HD filters for different game experience
Scary music
6 nights mod
Jumpscares
CCTV interactive cameras
